channel.title: Java pinger
channel.description: hey do you guys know where i could get a working java pinger, that makes most websites with low bandwith crash, and how to execute it

item.title: Java pinger
item.dc:creator: @Galook Galook
item.description:
@Galook wrote:

^^ yeah, you would need either alot of computers, or an awesome connection. Respect though Bob, glad you didnt help him and his malicious self.

Read full topic

item.title: Java pinger
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Just because mentioned making low bandwidth sites crashing (and using the code for malicious purpose), I’m not going to help you.

But I will say that ping floods don’t normally work unless the attacker has more outgoing bandwidth than the server has incoming bandwidth, and it doesn’t even make the server crash; it uses up much of the server’s bandwidth and stops the server from accepting new incoming connections from other visitors while the attack continues.

Read full topic
